title: Tracking our way out of COVID-19 in Texas
description: With vaccine rollouts well underway, ending the chaos of coronavirus requires tracking the path charted by officials to the finish line
contents:
When COVID-19 first began creeping through the United States in late February, search interest for the 2011 box-office thriller “Contagion” began skyrocketing as a search term on Google Trends. With a total run-time of 1 hour and 46 minutes, the film follows the spread of a novel virus that rapidly circulates across the globe, wreaking havoc on the world’s public health and its economy. Like our own pandemic, a vaccine is pursued throughout the film and (spoiler-alert), ultimately delivered. Despite its similarity to the realities inflicted upon the world by COVID-19, the vaccine rollout in Contagion only accounts for about 20%.
